mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow ( follow_hisFollower, follow_him ) VALUES ( ${follow_hisFollower}, ${follow_him} )
mapper.select: SELECT U.users_id, U.users_name, U.users_nickname, U.users_img, U.users_ctnt, (SELECT COUNT(follow_him) FROM follow WHERE follow_hisFollower = ${hisFollower} AND follow_him = ${him}) AS isYourFollower, (SELECT COUNT(follow_him) FROM follow WHERE follow_hisFollower = ${him} AND follow_him = ${hisFollower}) AS isMyFollower FROM users U WHERE U.users_id = ${him}

SELECT U.users_id, U.users_img, U.users_name, U.users_nickname, -- 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들 CASE WHEN W.follow_hisFollower IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isYourFollower -- 그사람을 팔로우한 사람을 내가 팔로우 하는가 👉 W.hisFollower = 나 , W.him = 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들 FROM follow F -- F.follow_him = 그 사람 , F.hisFollower = 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들을 -- 설정(WHERE)해주기 위해서 FROM은 follow에서 INNER JOIN users U -- 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들을 구하기 위해 INNER JOIN ON F.follow_hisFollower=U.users_id -- F.follow_him = 그 사람 , F.hisFollower = 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들 = U.users_id = W.him LEFT JOIN follow W -- 그사람을 팔로우하는 사람들을 내가 팔로우 하는지 구하기 위해 LEFT JOIN ON W.follow_him = F.follow_hisFollower AND W.follow_hisFollower=${follow_hisFollower} WHERE F.follow_him = ${follow_him}

SELECT U.users_id, U.users_img, U.users_name, U.users_nickname, CASE WHEN W.follow_hisFollower IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isYourFollower FROM follow F -- 그 사람이 팔로우 하는 사람들 = F.him , 그사람 = F.hisFollower -- 설정(WHERE)해주기 위해서 FROM은 follow에서 INNER JOIN users U -- U.users_id = F.him = 그 사람이 팔로우하는 사람들 ON F.follow_him=U.users_id LEFT JOIN follow W -- 그 사람이 팔로우하는 사람들을 내가 팔로우 하는지 -- 👉 W.him = F.him = U.users_id , W.hisFollower = 나 ON W.follow_him=F.follow_him AND W.follow_hisFollower=${follow_him} WHERE F.follow_hisFollower=${follow_hisFollower}
SELECT contents_id, contents_img FROM contents WHERE feed_id = ${feed_id} LIMIT 1

SELECT A.feed_id, IFNULL(B.cnt, 0) AS favCnt, IFNULL(D.cnt, 0) AS cmtCnt
, CASE WHEN E.feed_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isFav , CASE WHEN F.feed_id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS isCmt
FROM feed A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT feed_id, COUNT(feed_id) AS cnt FROM feed_fav GROUP BY feed_id ) B ON A.feed_id = B.feed_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT feed_id, COUNT(feed_id) AS cnt FROM cmt GROUP BY feed_id ) D ON A.feed_id = D.feed_id
LEFT JOIN feed_fav E ON E.users_id = ${user4FavCmt} AND A.feed_id = E.feed_id LEFT JOIN cmt F ON F.users_id = ${user4FavCmt} AND A.feed_id = F.feed_id
WHERE A.users_id = ${mypage_id} ORDER BY A.feed_id DESC LIMIT ${startIdx} , ${limit}

SELECT A.feed_id, A.users_id, A.feed_ctnt, A.feed_regdt , B.users_nickname, B.users_img , (SELECT COUNT(C.users_id) FROM feed_fav C WHERE C.feed_id = ${feed_id}) AS favCnt , (SELECT COUNT(D.cmt_id) FROM cmt D WHERE D.feed_id = ${feed_id}) AS cmtCnt FROM feed A LEFT JOIN users B ON A.users_id = B.users_id WHERE A.users_id = ${mypage_id} AND A.feed_id = ${feed_id}
